summary: Implements an end‑to‑end diffusion pipeline for image inpainting, orchestrating text and image encoding, latent diffusion, and VAE decoding while handling preprocessing and post‑processing of inputs and outputs.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate AI‑powered image inpainting into applications such as photo retouching, creative content generation, and visual effects, leveraging a pretrained Amused model for high‑quality results.
